text: Muret - Lherm Aerodrome (ICAO code: LFBR) is located at Lherm in the Haute- Garonne département in the Occitanie region. It is southwest of Muret. A campus of the École nationale de l'aviation civile (French civil aviation university) is located on the aerodrome.Muret Every year, in May, the airport welcomes the air show Airexpo.TOULOUSE : AIREXPO CE SAMEDI 14 MAI À L’AÉRODROME DE MURET-LHERM == Specifications == * Airfield elevation : 189 meters * Asphalt runway : 1 100 m × 30 m * Grass runway : 825 m × 50 m == Air show == * Airexpo, yearly air show == References == Category:Airports in France Category:Haute-Garonne
title: Muret – Lherm Aerodrome
